casebody.data:
FUTURE-TEC MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-5152. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: March 11, 2003.

Before CLEVENGER, BRYSON, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
